content.title: Purchase of Vehicle for Commercial Hiring Purpose for Persons with Disabilities
content.department: Haryana Backward Classes and Economically Weaker Sections Kalyan Nigam
content.details: The scheme 'Purchase of Vehicle for Commercial Hiring Purpose for Persons with Disabilities' is implemented by the Haryana Backward Classes and Economically Weaker Sections Kalyan Nigam, Government of Haryana. Under the scheme, loans are provided to differently-abled persons for commercial hiring purposes up to ₹10.00 lakhs, and for the purchase of special category vehicles like JCBs, trucks, road rollers, etc., loans up to ₹25.00 lakhs are available. Permanent residents of Haryana with a disability of 40% or more are eligible to avail the benefits under this scheme.
benefits: Loans are provided to differently abled persons for commercial hiring up to ₹10,00,000/- and for purchasing special category vehicles such as JCB, Trucks, Road rollers, etc., with loans up to ₹25,00,000/-.
eligibility: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Haryana.
The applicant should have a disability of at least 40%.
The age of the applicant should be above 18 years. For persons with mental retardation, the age is relaxed to 14 years instead of the usual 18 years.
License is applicable as per the policy of the National Corporation.
documents_required: Identity/Citizenship Proof (Any one of the following): Aadhaar Card
Age Proof (Any one of the following): Aadhaar Card
Resident Proof/Address Proof/Ownership Proof (Any one of the following): Ration Card, Haryana Domicile Certificate
Caste / Religion Proof (Any one of the following): Caste Certificate for reserved category
Disability Proof (Any one of the following): Disability Certificate (Disability should not be less than 40%)

faqs.question: What is the maximum loan amount available for commercial hiring vehicles?
faqs.answer: Loans up to ₹10.00 lakhs are available for commercial hiring vehicles.

faqs.question: What is the maximum loan amount available for special category vehicles?
faqs.answer: Loans up to ₹25.00 lakhs are available for special category vehicles like JCBs, trucks, and road rollers.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for this scheme?
faqs.answer: Permanent residents of Haryana with a disability of 40% or more are eligible.

faqs.question: What is the minimum age requirement for applicants?
faqs.answer: The applicant should be above 18 years old. For persons with mental retardation, the minimum age is 14 years.

faqs.question: Can a mentally retarded person apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, they can apply, and the minimum age requirement for them is 14 years.

faqs.question: How can one apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: Eligible applicants can apply online through the Official Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.

faqs.question: Where can one track their application status?
faqs.answer: Applicants can track their application status on the Official Antyodaya-SARAL Portal using the Department Name, Scheme Name, and Application Reference ID.

faqs.question: What type of vehicles can be purchased under the special category vehicle loan?
faqs.answer: Special category vehicles include JCBs, trucks, road rollers, etc.
